title: Leading men 's hair coloring brands in the U.S. 2019

data.Brand: Just For Men Touch of Gray

gold: In 2019 , Just For Men was the leading men 's hair coloring brand in the United States with sales of approximately 138 million U.S. dollars.
Ranked second , the Just For Men Autostop brand generated sales of around 27.2 million U.S. dollars that year .
